title: april 29: LA burning [hosted by: Noah Kahan] (with MAY-A)
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, guest host Noah Kahan remembers Los Angeles uprisings. After, he talks about a Drake album. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
